message:
I'm Searching for a free/paid Mobile/Tablets Database API ( API i can be used get a list of all mobiles/tablets ) , i've searched a lot but didn't find what i'm looking for , anyone can help me ?!

something like themoviedb , thegamesdb

* i'm not looking for online db for storage , i'm looking for an API that contains a list of all mobile devices with their Specs

data.message: Azure Mobile App services are free through a program from MS called Visual Studio Dev Essentials.

PDAdb offer large database for Mobiles and Tablets, It is not free, They clarified that You can contact them to get a license of using the DB in Your own project, Try this link:
http://pdadb.net/index.php?m=contact

Just a quick search, looks that there are some outdated stuff but it's ok to be mentioned anyways

Original source : http://stackoverflow.com/questions/6812293/is-there-any-information-database-which-lists-all-of-the-mobile-devices-and-spec

https://fonoapi.freshpixl.com/

https://github.com/OpenDDRdotORG/OpenDDR-Resources/tree/master/resources

http://wurfl.sourceforge.net/
